description.content:
This Postman Request was created with the Postman SDK and not the Postman.app
UI.

Gets all moves that have been reviewed and approved by the TOO. The `since`
parameter can be used to filter this list down to only the moves that have been
updated since the provided timestamp. A move will be considered updated if the
`updatedAt` timestamp on the move or on its orders, shipments, service items,
or payment requests, is later than the provided date and time.

This Request uses the templates found in
**templates/visualize.html**.

exec: // A helpful function that's less characters to type to get a Collection
// A helpful function that's less characters to type to set a Collection
// A helpful map of relationships between request file names and titles.
// The response JSON that Postman created.
// The custom header for Postman Request ID which is the filename of the
// The template file that is set in example-get-move-task-orders/index.js that
// A helpful string that can be used to show "undefined" in the Visualize tab.
// The view object that gets fed into the template file. These are base values
// and will be modified in the next conditional checks around the status code.
// If the Move is found, we'll update the view object appropriately.
console.info('Setting customerFullName in the Collection Variables');
console.info('Setting moveTaskOrderCode, moveTaskOrderID, moveTaskOrderETag in the Collection Variables');
view.alertTitle = 'Reweigh has been requested and completed';
// reweigh requested but not performed yet
view.alertTitle = 'Move is now available to GHC Prime Contractor';
// If the Move is not found, we'll update the view object appropriately.
view.alertTitle   = 'Move is not available to GHC Prime Contractor';
view.alertTitle     = 'Destination SIT Service Items Create Failed';
// response from update-mto-shipment endpoint is shipment JSON with new eTag

description.content:
This Postman Request was created with the Postman SDK and not the Postman.app
UI.

This endpoint gets an individual MoveTaskOrder by ID.

It will provide information about the Customer and any associated MTOShipments,
MTOServiceItems and PaymentRequests.

This Request uses the templates found in
**templates/visualize.html**.

description.content:
This Postman Request was created with the Postman SDK and not the Postman.app
UI.

This endpoint creates a storage in transit (SIT) extension request for a
shipment. A SIT extension request is a request an increase in the shipment day
allowance for the number of days a shipment is allowed to be in SIT. The total
SIT day allowance includes time spent in both origin and destination SIT.

This Request uses the templates found in
**templates/visualize.html**.

    • {{/each}}

  • Detail: {{errorDetail}}

{{/if}}

description.content:
# September 2021 Slice Demo

See the link to the slice demo script

This Postman Collection was created with the Postman SDK and not the Postman.app UI.
